title: Barclays Computers (PVT) Ltd. - KEYBOARD-KL-7MUU  - A4 Tech KL-7MUU X-Slim USB Keyboard(6M)
specs: Features: Beautiful Keyboard Styling: Cutting Edge Design and Cleverly crafted Key design & Key Layout Offering Pure Comfort. Headphone and Microphone Jacks: Headphone and Microphone Jacks at the left of keyboard , Conveniently and Practically Headphone and Microphone Jacks. Ideal keyboard for a Tablet PC / Standard PC: This beautiful & unique A4 design comprise numerous functions providing the end user with excellent options of control whilst at work on their PC Ideal keyboard for a Tablet PC / Standard PC. Ultra Slim Profile: Our innovative A4 design team have created the slimmest profile in today's keyboard market Ultra Slim Profile. USB port: USB port for plug & play input devices USB port. Multi Functional Internet Hot Keys: Support Multimedia Type Design, 17 Multi-functional Hot Keys can support Sleep, Volume Regulate , E-mail and Internet Multi Functional Internet Hot Keys.
